query: UPDATE credits SET status = 'paid' WHERE CAST(balance AS DECIMAL(10,2)) <= 0 AND status != 'paid';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 39APTXvo4uMgQep.root --database DeEuadowf9qAwz5LwVE6pc --execute UPDATE credits SET status = 'paid' WHERE CAST(balance AS DECIMAL(10,2)) <= 0 AND status != 'paid';
